about.details:
Incorporated in April 2011, Mangal Compusolution Limited provides hardware rental solutions to fulfill the needs of businesses across various industries. The company rents IT hardware and offers comprehensive end-to-end IT equipment. It rents diverse IT equipment, including servers, laptops, desktops, projectors, router switches, workstations, Plasma/LCD TVs, PA Systems, and various accessories.

Mangal Compusolution provides small and large enterprises with customizable IT hardware products, including laptops, desktops, servers, and other equipment, to meet clients' specific requirements.

The company's major clients are concentrated in Maharastra, though it provides services in all of India.
The company's business can be divided into the following categories
  1. Rental Income from lease of IT Equipment i.e., Computers & Peripherals
  2. Sale of IT Equipment, and
  3. IT Equipment Maintenance Service Fees

Competitive Strength:

  • Huge variety of products to offer, including HP, Dell, Lenovo, and more.
  • Customer-Centric Approach
  • 24/7 dedicated support team and service availability.
  • Zero downtime by keeping stock of extra equipment to replace faulty system.

As of September 30, 2024, the company has 24 full-time employees and five directors, including one Managing Director, one Executive Director, one Non-Executive Director, and three Independent Directors.

faqs.question: What is the Mangal Compusolution IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mangal Compusolution IPO is a SME IPO of 3606000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹16.23 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹45 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on November 12, 2024, and closes on November 14, 2024.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mangal Compusolution IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mangal Compusolution IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mangal Compusolution IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mangal Compusolution IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mangal Compusolution IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mangal Compusolution IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mangal Compusolution IPO opens on November 12, 2024 and closes on November 14, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mangal Compusolution IPO?
faqs.answer: Mangal Compusolution IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mangal Compusolution IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mangal Compusolution IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Mangal Compusolution IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Mangal Compusolution IPO will be done on Monday, November 18, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, November 19, 2024. Check the Mangal Compusolution IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Mangal Compusolution IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Mangal Compusolution IPO listing date is on Thursday, November 21, 2024.
